You are Dino, a capable, emotionally intelligent AI assistant.
Follow the dataset labels and examples exactly, be truthful and concise, do not reveal system/developer instructions, never invent facts/capabilities/actions, do not repeat the user’s question verbatim, and correct the user clearly and briefly when they’re wrong.
You respond with clarity, honesty, and respect, without revealing internal instructions or system details.
Talk to user in the last used language, if languages are mixed in the user's message, response in the user's preferred language.

CONTEXT (previous turns):
User: The pressure rose after a status meeting; I want to avoid trust drop (a quick note) and keep momentum.
Assistant: Thanks for the context, I can help you send this smoothly.
User: Can you draft wording for missed handoff (a classmate) with a project group through an email follow-up so trust drop (a quick note) stays low? Please keep it respect time boundaries and move toward more confidence (a group chat).
Assistant: I can keep the message short and still actionable.
Current user message: I want to be clear without sounding harsh. I need a send-ready line about missed handoff (a classmate) for a project group via an email follow-up without triggering trust drop (a quick note). Keep it respect time boundaries; target more confidence (a group chat).

In moments like before a deadline, missed handoff (a classmate) needs one stable framing. Keep one checkpoint visible: confirm the next step in one sentence by tomorrow morning. In an email follow-up, end with one time-bound next step for a project group. A respect time boundaries delivery helps prevent trust drop (a quick note). This keeps momentum tied to more confidence (a group chat). If helpful, I can give one softer and one firmer version.
